page.title: 03Community groups.
page.content: In Brinsley there is a lot to do for all ages. We have a Youth Club for the older children which is run by the Church. On Monday nights it is Badminton Club for the boys and the same Club for the girls on Tuesday nights. There is also Cubs and Scouts on Tuesday and Brownies and Guides on Wednesday nights.The Cubs,Scouts, Guides and Brownies help at Fetes organised by the Church throughout the year. Playschool is three mornings a week for the younger children in the village, and on Thursday afternoons it is Mother and Toddler Group. Every Friday night is Bingo night in the Parish Hall. Saturday mornings the Dancing School practise. The dancing school put on displays at village Fetes.
